author: reinhard
msg: fix site generation in multi-module builds: as long as site/pom.xml was a child of the root pom, the site module did crazy things. Now site/pom.xml is a root POM and references all modules that procude site content. Probably the problem was the the root pom was in in the execution chain AND in the inheritance chain.

author: vgritsenko
msg: adding logger parameter -- not inherited from selector

msg: TOBAGO-398: made sure favicons are displayed after opening a popup, too

msg: Moved the new Definition class to "org.apache.tiles" package.
